DOC.brief_title: A Thorough QTc Trial Evaluating Effect SNAC Cardiac Repolarisation Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Male age 1855 year ( inclusive ) time sign informed consent Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5âˆ’28.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Considered generally healthy base medical history , physical examination , result vital sign clinical laboratory test perform screen visit , judge investigator Normal electrocardiogram ( ECG ) screen minor finding consider clinically significant , judged investigator Smoker ( define subject smoke 5 cigarette equivalent per week ) , subject smoke equal le 5 cigarette equivalent per week able willing refrain smoking use nicotine substitute product within 48 hour prior dose inpatient period Any blood draw excess 25 mL past month , donation blood plasma excess 400 mL within 3 month precede screen Sitting blood pressure screening ( rest least 5 minute ) outside range 90139 mmHg systolic 5089 mmHg diastolic History major surgical procedure involve stomach potentially affect absorption trial product ( e.g . subtotal total gastrectomy , sleeve gastrectomy , gastric bypass surgery )
